items.title: Woman of the Hour
items.question: Will Woman of the Hour movie make an Audience score below 75% in rotten tomatoes after 2024-10-15 00:00:00?
items.description: This market resolves to YES if at any point after 2024-10-15 00:00:00 UTC, the audience score is strictly below 75%. The only source of truth is rotten tomatoes (https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/woman_of_the_hour)
items.reasons: The film 'Woman of the Hour' is based on a compelling true story and stars Anna Kendrick, which may attract interest. However, as audience preferences can vary widely and depend on execution, an estimated score of 75% reflects positive but cautious expectations.
